briefdescription.para: Manager for measurement point CSV operations.
Flag indicating if configuration portal is active.
Get alarm events for a specific point within date range.
Apply configuration settings without device restart.

detaileddescription.para: Updates runtime parameters when configuration changes
Configures fundamental device information and status endpoints
Configures endpoints for sensor discovery and management
Configures endpoints for CSV file upload and download operations
Configures endpoints for measurement point configuration and status
Configures endpoints for alarm management and history
Configures endpoints for log file access and management
Configures endpoints for downloading log files and configurations

briefdescription.para: Static callback function for configuration changes.

detaileddescription.para:
key
Configuration key that was changed
Called by ConfigAssist when any configuration value is modified

tempController
Reference to the temperature controller instance
Initializes configuration system with temperature controller integration
Cleans up web server and configuration resources

bool True if initialization successful
Sets up file system, configuration, web server and all API endpoints

briefdescription.para: Update configuration system (call in main loop)

detaileddescription.para: Handles web server requests and configuration portal updates

timeoutMs
Connection timeout in milliseconds (default: 15000)
bool True if WiFi connection successful
Attempts connection using configured SSID and password

WebServer* Pointer to the HTTP web server
Provides access to the web server for additional endpoint configuration

briefdescription.para: Check if configuration portal is active.

simplesect.para: bool True if portal is currently running
bool True if Modbus communication is enabled
uint8_t GPIO pin for RS485 receive
uint8_t GPIO pin for RS485 transmit
bool True if automatic sensor discovery is enabled

detaileddescription.para: Clears historical min/max temperature records for all measurement points

detaileddescription.para: Handles all aspects of system configuration including WiFi setup, web interface management, CSV import/export, and API endpoints
